sourcesContent:
<template>
  <VApp>
    <v-app-bar app dark color="#333">
      <v-container>
        <v-row justify="center">
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            sm="10"
            md="8"
            lg="6"
            xl="4"
            class="text-center"
          >
            <v-slide-y-transition>
              <v-card class="pa-4" :class="headerCardClass">
                <v-card-title class="white--text headline">
                  Farming and Crop Delivery
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text class="white--text body-1">
                  Exploring the world of agriculture and direct-to-consumer crop delivery
                </v-card-text>
              </v-card>
            </v-slide-y-transition>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-app-bar>
  </VApp>
</template>

<script>
import {
  VApp,
  VContainer,
  VRow,
  VCol,
  VCard,
  VCardTitle,
  VCardText,
  VSlideYTransition
} from 'vuetify';

export default {
  name: 'AppHeaderSection',
  components: {
    VApp,
    VContainer,
    VRow,
    VCol,
    VCard,
    VCardTitle,
    VCardText,
    VSlideYTransition
  },
  computed: {
    headerCardClass() {
      // Access $vuetify via this.$vuetify
      if (this.$vuetify) {
        return {
          'headline-md': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
          'headline-sm-and-down': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
          'body-md': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
          'body-sm-and-down': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown
        };
      }
      // Handle the case when $vuetify is not available
      return {};
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
/* Your styles */
.headline {
  font-size: 2rem;
}

.headline-md {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
}

.headline-sm-and-down {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.body-1 {
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.body-md {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.body-sm-and-down {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  .headline {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .body-1 {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
  }
}
</style>
